title: Differences Between \Dfrac and \Frac
description: Matplotlib is a data visualization library in Python. In this tutorial, we will discuss the differences between \dfrac and \frac TeX macros when using Mathtex in Matplotlib.

meta.title: Differences Between \Dfrac and \Frac in Matplotlib
meta.description: Learn the differences between the \dfrac and \frac TeX macros when using Mathtex in Matplotlib, a popular data visualization library in Python.
meta.keywords: matplotlib, python, tex macros, data visualization, dfrac
